titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING) - Description

div.p: PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING) is the year and month of the recorded PROCEDURE DATE when Retinopathy of Prematurity Screening was performed.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING) is submitted instead of PROCEDURE DATE AND TIME (RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING), where the data set record is anonymised.
